properties.areaDesc: St. Joseph, MI; Noble, IN; Lagrange, IN; Marshall, IN; St. Joseph, IN; Fulton, IN; Starke, IN; Elkhart, IN; Kosciusko, IN; Pulaski, IN; Cass, MI; Miami, IN; La Porte, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 10:28AM EST until January 11 at 1:15PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
Elkhart County in north central Indiana...
Northwestern Noble County in northeastern Indiana...
Kosciusko County in north central Indiana...
Lagrange County in northeastern Indiana...
Southeastern La Porte County in northwestern Indiana...
Central St. Joseph County in north central Indiana...
Eastern Pulaski County in northwestern Indiana...
Fulton County in north central Indiana...
Starke County in northwestern Indiana...
Northwestern Miami County in north central Indiana...
Marshall County in north central Indiana...
Southeastern Cass County in southwestern Michigan...
Southwestern St. Joseph County in southwestern Michigan...

* Until 115 PM EST/1215 PM CST/.

* At 1020 AM EST/920 AM CST/, Doppler radar and automated rain
gauges indicated moderate rain was falling over the area with one
to two inches of rain has already fallen. Standing water has been
reported in Millersburg, Mishawaka, and Three Rivers. Water has
also been reported on State Route 19 south of Mentone. Additional
rainfall up to one half inch possible through midday.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
South Bend, Elkhart, Mishawaka, Goshen, Warsaw, Sturgis, Plymouth,
Three Rivers, Nappanee, Rochester, Winona Lake, Bremen, Ligonier,
Knox, Syracuse, Lagrange, Winamac, Dunlap, Simonton Lake and
Gulivoire Park.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Please report flooding to your local law enforcement agency when you
can do so safely.
